author: Associated Press
title: Red Sox Shut Training Complex as Minor Leaguer Tests Positive for Coronavirus
description: A minor league player for the Boston Red Sox tested positive for the virus, prompting the team to close its Fort Myers training complex
content:
(BOSTON) — A minor league player for the Boston Red Sox has tested positive for the coronavirus, prompting the team to close down its training complex in Fort Myers, Florida.
The Red Sox made the announcement Tuesday, a day after the positive diagnosis. The … [+855 chars]
